item.title: W11-S1 Infinite Sequences and Series
item.description: 周次: 11 日期: May 6, 2022 节次: 2 In this lecture, we will discuss series and sequences, these are new concept and very important ones. Before talking about series, we will talk about sequences. Overview In this chapter we study how to add together infinitely many numbers. This is a subject of the theory of infinite series. It is clear that infinite sum sometimes
